title: Initiator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a target and clear the path towards their house. Any player besides you visiting that target tonight will be protected with Basic defense, roleblock immunity and prevention immunity. If your target attempts to self-target tonight, their ability will fail. (4 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have the highest priority. However, if you would be killed, your ability will fail regardless.
- You can't protect more than four people at a time. If five or more players visit your target, you will protect those with the highest priority, and in cases of a tie in priority, it's decided at random.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Lead the charge against every criminal and evildoer.
